abce.agency.async
Class TemporalObjectGrid2D

java.lang.Object
  abce.agency.async.TemporalObjectGrid2D
All Implemented Interfaces:
AsyncUpdate
public class TemporalObjectGrid2D
extends java.lang.Object
implements AsyncUpdate

Temporal version of Mason's ObjectGrid2D. Could not extend the class directly because its set() method was marked as final. Used encapsulation instead.

Author:
kkoning

public void update()
Description copied from interface: AsyncUpdate
Commit the changes made to this object to the underlying data structure. For example, if the implementing object is a hash map, it should apply all the changes it has saved and deferred to the backing HashMap.
